Ty Nasello

About Me

I am currently a high school student in Grade 11 at Sandwich Secondary in LaSalle, Ontario. I love working with computers and solving complex problems. At school, my favourite subjects are computer, math and science related. Through self-teaching methods and different projects I have completed, I have been able to develop new skills. My goals for the future involve attending university to study in the fields of Computer Science or Engineering.

In my free time I enjoy exercising, working on projects, listening to podcasts, and playing sports.


Feel free to contact me at any time via email. I also encourage you to view my github account and resume.

Service Employee | Tim Horton's | July 2018 - Present

I am currently an employee at Tim Horton's. I have been employed since I turned 15. I am responsible for filling customer orders and guaranteeing customer satisfaction in an efficient manner. I actively work with a team of co-workers to ensure group goals are met. I ensure that proper guidelines and procedures are followed during the preparation and storage of food items.

My Projects

I always like to have a project in progress. View the projects I have completed so far

Obstacle Avoiding Arduino Robot

The purpose of this project was to create a fully functional robot using an arduino microcontroller. The robot performs certain maneuvers based on input from a bluetooth terminal application.
